brand_section_card1_description: Select font pairs that align with your brand's personality or customize them to fit your preferences. Fine-tune font size and alignment to achieve a polished, professional look while enhancing readability.
brand_section_card2_description: Effortlessly incorporate your logo and brand colors for cohesive, recognizable carousels. Choose from curated color palettes or design your own to perfectly complement your brand's identity.
brand_section_card3_description: Personalize carousels for corporate and individual profiles. Easily integrate your logo, include your website URL or social handle, and deliver impactful branding. Designed to adapt seamlessly to diverse content formats
design_tool_section_card1_description: Drag and drop slides to effortlessly change their order. Organize your content with ease.
design_tool_section_card2_description: Select from a variety of arrow styles or text options for seamless navigation. Customize the look and feel of your carousel.
design_tool_section_card3_description: Your progress is saved automatically as you work, so you never have to worry about losing your changes.
design_tool_section_card4_description: Click the Randomize button to instantly apply a unique mix of fonts, colors, backgrounds, and designs. Ideal for sparking creativity and exploring fresh ideas.
question: Question
feature1_description: Seamlessly transform any topic into a captivating carousel. Simply input your idea, and let our AI do the magic!
feature2_description: Effortlessly turn blog articles or URLs into visually stunning carousel slides. Ideal for sharing in-depth information with your audience.
feature3_description: Transform your text into eye-catching carousel slides in seconds. Perfect for creating impactful content quickly and efficiently.
feature4_description: Connect with audiences from different countries by generating carousels in several popular languages. Expand your content’s reach with ease.
home_section_description: Carousel Builder lets you quickly create and design beautiful carousels for your social media posts using AI, without any design expertise
template_section_card1_description: Enhance your slides with a selection of stunning background patterns and designs, adding depth.
template_section_card2_description: Kickstart your design with professionally crafted templates and make them your own. No need to design from the ground.
template_section_card3_description: Personalize your carousels even further by uploading your own backgrounds. Achieve unique, branded visuals effortlessly.

faq_question_1: What is Carousel Builder and how does it work?
faq_answer_1: Just type your idea or text, and our AI will turn it into a beautiful carousel organized slides with layout suggestions and ready-to-go designs.
faq_answer_2: Yes! We offer a free plan with basic features. If you want more like high-quality exports and unlimited carousels you can upgrade to a paid plan.
faq_question_3: How does the AI carousel generator work?
faq_answer_3: You enter a topic, some text, or even a URL, and our AI creates engaging slide content and applies it to a well-designed layout for your chosen social platform.
faq_answer_4: Absolutely. You can edit everything text, colors, fonts, images, layout, and even add your brand. Start with a template and make it your own.
faq_question_5: Which social media platforms are supported?
faq_answer_5: You can use your carousels on *LinkedIn*, *Instagram*, *Facebook*, *TikTok*, and *Pinterest*. Export in *PDF* or *PNG*, ready to post anywhere.
faq_answer_6: You can download your carousels as *PDF* or *high-quality PNG* files perfect for sharing on social media.
faq_question_7: Is Carousel Builder better than creating carousels manually?
faq_answer_7: Yes. Our AI saves you hours by generating content, suggesting designs, and optimizing for different platforms all in just a few clicks.
faq_question_8: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_answer_8: We accept *credit and international debit cards*. All transactions are secure, and you can cancel your subscription anytime from your dashboard.
faq_answer_9: Reach us via the *live chat on the website* or send an email to *contact@carouselbuilder.io* — we respond quickly!
about_us_paragraph1: Carousel Builder is your go-to AI-powered platform for creating stunning social media carousels fast, easy, and without the need for design skills.
about_us_paragraph2: We empower content creators, marketers, entrepreneurs, and agencies to transform ideas into professional-looking carousel posts in just a few clicks. Whether you're aiming to educate, sell, or inspire, Carousel Builder helps you craft scroll-stopping visuals that drive engagement and growth across platforms like
why_carousel_builder_point1: AI-Powered Simplicity: Our smart tools assist you in writing compelling content, choosing the right structure, and designing eye-catching visuals.
why_carousel_builder_point2: No Design Skills Needed: Choose from ready-to-use templates and customize them to fit your brand in seconds.
why_carousel_builder_point3: Save Time, Maximize Impact: Create and export high-converting carousels in minutes — no more wasted hours on complicated design tools.
why_carousel_builder_point4: Built for Global Creators: Multi-language support and optimized export settings for different social media platforms.
why_carousel_builder_point5: Results-Driven: More shares, more saves, more attention. Carousels are one of the best-performing content formats today — and we make them accessible to everyone.
our_mission_paragraph1: We believe that great content should be easy to create. Our mission is to remove the barriers between ideas and impactful communication, helping creators of all levels grow their audience and brand with professional carousel posts — without needing a design team.
our_mission_paragraph2: Join thousands of users who are already leveling up their content game with Carousel Builder.
ready_to_build_your_next_viral_carousel: Ready to build your next viral carousel?
refund_policy_description: This Refund Policy applies to all purchases made on our website:
satisfaction_guarantee_paragraph1: At *Carousel Builder*, customer satisfaction is our top priority. We offer an AI-powered platform to help you create high-quality carousels, and we are committed to delivering an excellent user experience.
satisfaction_guarantee_paragraph2: If, for any reason, you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may request a refund within the timeframe outlined below, and we will review your request accordingly.
refunds_for_subscription_plans_point1: Monthly and annual plans are eligible for a *full refund within 7 days* of the purchase date, provided that the platform has not been used excessively or fraudulently.
refunds_for_subscription_plans_point2: After this period, *no partial or prorated refunds* will be issued, except where required by law.
refunds_for_subscription_plans_point3_pa: Refunds must be requested by email at
with the subject "Refund Request", including your account email and the reason for your request.
exceptions_description: Refunds will *not* be granted in the following cases:
exceptions_point1: Users who have made extensive use of the platform (e.g., exporting more than 10 carousels).
exceptions_point2: Accounts that have violated our Terms of Use or show signs of fraudulent behavior.
exceptions_point3: Purchases made during special promotions clearly marked as non-refundable.
processing_time_description: Once we receive your valid refund request:
processing_time_point1: We will review it within *5 business days*.
processing_time_point2: If approved, your refund will be processed via the original payment method.
processing_time_point3: Please note that the time it takes for the funds to appear in your account depends on your bank or card provider.
subscription_cancellation_paragraph: You may cancel your subscription at any time directly through your account. Canceling a subscription stops future charges but *does not guarantee a refund* of previous payments, unless within the 7-day refund period.
questions_description: If you have any questions about this refund policy, please contact us at:
